title: How to get free PayPal money in 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: Free Paypal money in 2020! How, where? I have heard about it but only in the USA. I really do not understand how this is done though, but it's better to find out from PayPal. Sometimes its a trick, luring people into subscribing to such services and then they get away with your personal details. Just be careful it may not be genuine.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Jill Scoot and Ethan Brooks

response.answer_text: Hello, There’s no way of getting free PayPal money, and if you see a video or website claiming to offer “free” PayPal money, then be warned : it’s most likely a scam. PayPal is simply an online wallet, allowing you to safely use your money online for different transactions such as buying, receiving and sending money.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Jill Scoot and Ethan Brooks
